Class Organism

  • java.lang.Object
    • Organism
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Carnivore, Herbivore

    public abstract class Organism
extends java.lang.Object
    Parent class of herbivores and carnivores

                int speed,
                int detectRadius,
                int eggCycle,
                int carnivorePoints,
                double energy,
                double metabolism,
                long chaseLength)
        Organism constructor
        Parameters:
        pos - position of organism
        angle - angle of movement
        speed - speed of organism
        detectRadius - detection radius of organism
        eggCycle - egg cycle time of organism
        carnivorePoints - carnivore points of organism
        energy - energy of organism
        metabolism - matabolism rate of organism
        chaseLength - maximum chase length of organism
